title: Rise of the vibecoding journalists
description: In 2025, advances in AI-powered code generation led to the ability to “vibe code,” i.e. create apps through prompting without even looking at the code. These vibe-coding tools lowered the cost and technical expertise required to build prototypes. After spending a year building media tools with LLMs, I predicted more dynamic and interactive interfaces for...
